entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 10:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
